dct_title_s: Novissima et Accuratissima TOTIUS AMERICÃ† DESCRIPTIO
dct_description_sm: California as an island with nearly flat northern coast, much like Goos type. Straet Anian and Anian to far north. Partial coastline of Zelandia Nova to far southwest.
Cartography based on Visscher map of 1670. And is very similar to Ogilby's and Schagen's 1671 maps of this same title.
Title cartouche (lower left)differs, with seated native "America"overlooking others displaying gifts. An elaborate vignette of Neptune and sea creatures at upper left.
From: Die unbekante neue welt oder beschreibung des welt-teils Amerika... / Montanus, A. -- Amsterdam : [s.n., 1673].
